body: Fetchlings who have spent most of their lives on the Material Plane can become more acclimated to their new environments. Instead of gaining a +2 racial bonus on Knowledge (planes) checks, these fetchlings gain a +1 racial bonus on Knowledge (nature) and Knowledge (local) checks. This racial trait modifies the skilled racial trait.
name: World Walker
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Fetchlings/Alternate Racial Traits/World Walker
